A Song<S>7892</S> of degrees<S>4609</S>. Behold, bless<S>1288</S> ye the LORD<S>3068</S>, all ye servants<S>5650</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S>, which by night<S>3915</S> stand<S>5975</S> in the house<S>1004</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S>.
Lift up<S>5375</S> your hands<S>3027</S> in the sanctuary<S>6944</S>, and bless<S>1288</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>. <sup>the sanctuary: or, holiness</sup>
The LORD<S>3068</S> that made<S>6213</S> heaven<S>8064</S> and earth<S>776</S> bless<S>1288</S> thee out of Zion<S>6726</S>.
